holidays.title: National Brownie Day
holidays.description: Indulge in gooey goodness and let the world melt away for a delectable moment.

holidays.title: Pretend To Be A Time Traveler Day
holidays.description: On this day of imagination and time-hopping, we go wherever we want.

holidays.title: Albanian National Youth Day
holidays.description: The future belongs to the youths; encourage youth activities to help the next generation thrive.

holidays.title: Bodhi Day
holidays.description: Prepare your hearts and minds as we celebrate a day that brings out the best in us.

holidays.title: Feast of the Immaculate Conception
holidays.description: Let us celebrate Mary and her sinless conception on the Feast of the Immaculate Conception.

holidays.title: Feast of the Immaculate Conception
holidays.description: A very important pillar of Catholic teaching is celebrated on the Feast of the Immaculate Conception.

holidays.title: Immaculate Conception Day
holidays.description: Learn how to kick off Spain’s Christmas season with the Immaculate Conception Day celebrations.

holidays.title: Lard Day
holidays.description: Get your apron ready as we learn about cooking with lard this Lard Day.

holidays.title: National Blue Collar Day
holidays.description: Let's recognize the American heroes of blue-collar work and show them they're not forgotten.

holidays.title: National Health Savings Account Day
holidays.description: It’s time to unite the public and healthcare benefits industry! Let’s learn more.

holidays.title: National Simon Day
holidays.description: We love celebrations! Today gives us a good reason to honor all the Simons we know.

holidays.title: Panama Mother’s Day
holidays.description: Get ready to give your time, gifts, and love as we celebrate the women dearest to us.

holidays.title: Santa Marian Kamalen Day
holidays.description: With emotion and devotion, honor Santa Marian Kamalen, the patron saint of Guam.

holidays.title: St. Clement of Ohrid
holidays.description: Behold, the enlightener of the Slavs! Commemorate his day with us right here!

holidays.title: Take it in the Ear Day
holidays.description: Yes, it's Take it in the Ear Day but don’t be putting anything in your ear!

holidays.title: Udhauli Parva
holidays.description: Don your colors and get ready to say thank you to Mother Nature on this Udhauli Parva!

holidays.title: Uzbekistan Constitution Day
holidays.description: Surviving the Soviets! Celebrate the sovereignty and rich history of the Republic of Uzbekistan.

holidays.title: Virgin of Caacupé Day
holidays.description: Ready to believe in miracles? Uncover the story behind the Patroness of Paraguay.

holidays.title: Ann Coulter’s Birthday
holidays.description: A lawyer, litigator, columnist, an author, and a media pundit, Ann Coulter is versatile!

holidays.title: Benjamin Rein Brady’s Birthday
holidays.description: He watches football, loves ice hockey, and plays in the Brookline Youth Hockey League.

holidays.title: Clarence White’s Birthday
holidays.description: Initially, his brand only sold T-shirts but soon started selling streetwear like pants and hoodies.

holidays.title: Corey Taylor’s Birthday
holidays.description: Success isn't a thing of luck to Taylor but is something he fought hard for.

holidays.title: Deveraux Jagger’s Birthday
holidays.description: If you're a fan of Mick Jagger, you'll love his adorable son Deveraux Jagger.

holidays.title: Dharmendra’s Birthday
holidays.description: He starred in several movies with top actresses and soon built a bankable reputation.

holidays.title: Diego Rivera’s Birthday
holidays.description: Mexican painter Diego Rivera is considered the father of Mexican cultural post-impressionist art.

holidays.title: Dwight Howard’s Birthday
holidays.description: Dwight Howard is a talented basketball player who has achieved accolades and fame in his career.

holidays.title: Gregg Allman’s Birthday
holidays.description: For the iconic Allman, the rise from grass to grace was about determination and hard work.

holidays.title: Ian Somerhalder’s Birthday
holidays.description: Somerhalder got married to actress Nikki Reed, and the couple welcomed a child in 2017.

holidays.title: Jim Morrison’s Birthday
holidays.description: He graduated from U.C.L.A.'s film school and lived in Venice Beach, California.

holidays.title: Kappa Kaiju’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn more about this interesting Aussie YouTube commentary star who believes in keeping a low profile

holidays.title: Kim Basinger’s Birthday
holidays.description: Get all the info on one of the most successful actresses of the ‘80s — Kim Basinger.

holidays.title: Mary Queen of Scots’s Birthday
holidays.description: Mary Stuart's life was full of romance, tragedy, drama, and war, as well as controversies.

holidays.title: Nicki Minaj’s Birthday
holidays.description: There’s a reason why she is called the queen of hip-hop and we’ve all the details.

holidays.title: Nicole Laeno’s Birthday
holidays.description: Laeno also works as a makeup artist; she has a dedicated YouTube channel for makeup videos.

holidays.title: Pee Wee’s Birthday
holidays.description: Dare, believe, and act — the ingredients needed to cook one's success, and Pee Wee proved that!

holidays.title: Philip Rivers’s Birthday
holidays.description: Philip Rivers, the famous American football quarterback, has achieved a lot during his lifetime.

holidays.title: Sam Hunt’s Birthday
holidays.description: Singer and songwriter, Sam Hunt, has broken several records. Read on to find out more!

holidays.title: Tanner Buchanan’s Birthday
holidays.description: At the pace Tanner Buchanan is moving, he’s one stepping stone away from superstardom.

holidays.title: Teri Hatcher’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s get to know one of the “Desperate Housewives” leading actors, Teri Hatcher!
